entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Updates on the Covid-19 situation in the Philippines
entity.description: This page provides real-time updates on the Covid-19 situation from trusted and official sources.

text: As Luzon enters the fourth week of the government-imposed lockdown, what are your thoughts on proposals to extend the enhanced community quarantine to "flatten the curve" and further contain the spread of the coronavirus disease 2019? https://t.co/brH2B74ppz
